pages.text: It seems those [Shooting Stars](book://resources/stargazing) have more secrets than you previously thought, and weird ones at that.\Baked [Stardust](book://resources/stargazing@stardust) tastes oddly refreshing, the magic makes your tongue tingle as the heaven-sent candy dissolves in your mouth. You felt an odd lot healthier afterwards.\Their hard, golden flesh has some purple speckles, shimmering like star shards.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Perhaps the speckles are the source of their restorative properties? You are left to wonder if it is possible to create a fully purple one.

pages.title: A rare Find
pages.text: Now THAT's a tasty one!\Even just touching those star-laden streaks gives you much the same tingle as when you ate the whole thing.
